description: This file is a test specification for the HelloWorld Vue component, verifying its rendering behavior using Vitest and Vue Test Utils.

methods.name: describe
methods.description: Defines a test suite for the HelloWorld component.

methods.name: it
methods.description: Defines a test case that ensures the HelloWorld component renders correctly.

methods.name: expect
methods.description: Performs an assertion to verify that the component output contains the expected text.

ctags.name: wrapper
ctags.pattern: /^    const wrapper = mount(HelloWorld, { props: { msg: 'Hello Vitest' } })$/
